channel.title: Engine 481 Update Masks
channel.description:
I Took A Look Into 481 Client, and i found some 481 update masks here they are
Mask 4 : Appearance Update
Mask 80 : FaceNPC
Mask 40 : Animations!!!!
Mask 8 : Chat Update
Mask 100 : GFX
Mask 10: Hit Update
creds = me
im about 90% they are right
reason posting, because iw ant p-servers to go to the next level, i will be building a 481 in my own time

item.title: Engine 481 Update Masks
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

TeleNubby:

Or, you can create your own and drop the thread-per-client model.

May I suggest learning NIO or MINA?

item.title: Engine 481 Update Masks

item.description:
@sir_pk_p00n wrote:

i prefer rs2d because im been learning about it and it looks very good and stable and it will be nice to have a 481 rs2d, then if i release the server, then no more stupid winterlove base servers ;D

item.title: Engine 481 Update Masks
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“sir pk p00n, post:3, topic:213951”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=281562.msg2287633#msg2287633 date=1213995426]

reason posting, because iw ant p-servers to go to the next level, i will be building a 481 in my own time
[/quote]If you do, do NOT look and base anything off of winterLove’s server or ANY derivitive. Be sure to make one with a model OTHER THAN thread-per-client, and keep memory/cpu usage at a MINIMUM.

yes i am, i may edit rs2d and then work of that ut with alot of edits[/quote]Or, you can create your own and drop the thread-per-client model.

Read full topic
